0110001011010000 1100001101010011 1 -> sum: 0010011000100100, cout: 1
1101111100001111 0100110011001111 1 -> sum: 0010101111011111, cout: 1
1100111111011011 1000111011011010 1 -> sum: 0101111010110110, cout: 1
1111110110010010 1010000001101000 0 -> sum: 1001110111111010, cout: 1
1000101100111110 1011100111111101 0 -> sum: 0100010100111011, cout: 1
0010111100010000 0001110010010111 1 -> sum: 0100101110101000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
